name: Kogneta
tagline: Helping franchises and multi-location brands grow
description:
We work with multi-location brands and franchises to help them find and retain customers using data-driven marketing strategies. 
We use our 10 years of experience in PPC advertising, SEO, content marketing, social media marketing and local SEO the companies that we partner with meet their marketing and sales goals. 
Are you ready to grow your franchise or multi-location brands? Get in touch with us today to find out how we can help you.
